page.title: 11GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content:
A popular game that has recently become popular is "Elastics".To play it you need a large loop of elastic.This can be held taut between two peoples' legs or bodies.Other children try to jump over,on and in-between it.As they progress,the elastic is held higher up the body.Here are two songs that are sung while playing. { { England,Ireland,Scotland,Wales. { Inside,outside,inside,scales. { { }and
{Granny Smith put her knickerbockers on {inside out. { Another name that is used for this game is "French skipping".
